channel.title: Trouble Jarring Client
channel.description:
Greetings.
I'm having a bit of trouble jarring my client using Jarmaker.
Error: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8ejcexi.png[/img]
My run.bat: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cyTvOMW.png[/img]
My client folder: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jkiJb2O.png[/img]
What is my main class? I know normally it should be either client or loader, but none of them work. I believe the answer is located in my run.bat but I'm not sure what to put for my main class.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Trouble Jarring Client
item.dc:creator: @Rickymac6 Rickymac6
item.description:
@Rickymac6 wrote:

Pure_:

Shouldn’t it be client? Try replacing Main in your run file with client (try both client and Client).

Replaced “Main” with both “Client” & “client” in my run.bat and changed my jarmaker main-class manifest to both “client” & “Client”. Both didn’t work. Also, when I change “Main” to “Client” it says;

“Could not find or load main class client” when I try to run my run.bat.

Could it be the way my folder is set up?

Also, the client I’m using is located [URL=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,637421.0.html""]here[/URL].

Read full topic
